mapper.select: SELECT bjfstjb.tjrq,sum(bjfstjb.jjsl)as jjsl,bjfsdmb.bjfsmc as bjfsdm FROM REC_BJFSTJB bjfstjb LEFT JOIN DICT_BJFSDMB bjfsdmb ON bjfstjb.bjfsdm=bjfsdmb.bjfsdm WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} group by bjfstjb.bjfsdm,bjfstjb.tjrq,bjfsdmb.bjfsmc

SELECT sum(bjfstjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,bjfstjb.tjrq,bjfsdmb.bjfsmc as bjfsdm FROM REC_BJFSTJB bjfstjb LEFT JOIN DICT_BJFSDMB bjfsdmb ON bjfstjb.bjfsdm=bjfsdmb.bjfsdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by bjfstjb.bjfsdm ,bjfstjb.tjrq,bjfsdmb.bjfsmc ORDER BY bjfstjb.tjrq desc

SELECT xzqh.xzqhmc as xzqhdm,sum(bjfstjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,bjfstjb.tjrq,bjfsdmb.bjfsmc as bjfsdm FROM REC_BJFSTJB bjfstjb LEFT JOIN DICT_BJFSDMB bjfsdmb ON bjfstjb.bjfsdm=bjfsdmb.bjfsdm LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqh ON SUBSTR(xzqh.xzqhdm,1, 4)=bjfstjb.xzqhdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by bjfstjb.bjfsdm ,bjfstjb.tjrq,bjfsdmb.bjfsmc,xzqh.xzqhmc

SELECT xzqh.xzqhmc AS xzqhdm,bjfstjb.jjsl AS jjsl ,bjfstjb.tjrq,bjfsdmb.bjfsmc as bjfsdm FROM REC_BJFSTJB bjfstjb LEFT JOIN DICT_BJFSDMB bjfsdmb ON bjfstjb.bjfsdm=bjfsdmb.bjfsdm LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqh ON SUBSTR(xzqh.xzqhdm,1, 4)=bjfstjb.xzqhdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND bjfstjb.xzqhdm=#{xzqhdm}
